Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2017 12:26PM JoLizz wrote: I have dreamed about it 3 times I guess. Now I'm in the middle of my rads and can't wait for my real hair start to grow. Last night I dreamed I had short hair like a bob and brown like my own hair, it was so real. And I felt the same disappointment when I woke up with my little fuzz lol. Gosh I miss my long hair but I'm patiently waiting
Posts.Title: Anyone else dreaming about their hair? NatsFan Jackster51
